text: Ate jekara unham di be-mukhata tuhanu bhari japadi hai ate jekara tuhade vica kujha samaratha hai tam tusim zamina vica ko'i suraga labhom jam asamana nu pa'uri laga'u ate unham la'i ko'i nisani lai a'u. Ate jekara alaha cahuda tam inham sari'am nu cage raha ute ikatha kara dida. Tam tusim na samajha na bano
